The timeout of a single command. Does not lead to an error (yet), because we still retry.
The total timeout of the retries. If no valid data is received after this time, then we consider the shutters in error.

Buffer to write all logging to
Temporary buffer to write logging by parts (sub-statemachines) to

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.pumpsRelay._log( name := 'pumpsRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.upperOpenRelay._log( name := 'upperOpenRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.upperCloseRelay._log( name := 'upperCloseRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.lowerOpenRelay._log( name := 'lowerOpenRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.lowerCloseRelay._log( name := 'lowerCloseRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.reset._log( name := 'processes.reset', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.open._log( name := 'processes.open', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.close._log( name := 'processes.close', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.stop._log( name := 'processes.stop', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.lowerOpen._log( name := 'processes.lowerOpen', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.lowerClose._log( name := 'processes.lowerClose', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.upperOpen._log( name := 'processes.upperOpen', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.processes.upperClose._log( name := 'processes.upperClose', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));
